trans-unit.source: Enables the use of standard commands to control the editing of property values.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用標準命令控制屬性值的編輯功能。

trans-unit.source: Gets the command that the editor raises to abort an attempt to update a property value.
trans-unit.target: 取得編輯器所引發的命令，以中止更新屬性值的嘗試行為。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> that aborts a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 中止交易的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: If this command is executed when there are not any open transactions, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在沒有任何開放交易時執行這個命令，就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Gets the command that the editor raises to begin an attempt to update a property value.
trans-unit.target: 取得編輯器所引發的命令，以開始更新屬性值的嘗試行為。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> that begins a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 開始交易的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the command that the editor raises to commit an update of a property value.
trans-unit.target: 取得編輯器所引發的命令，以認可屬性值的更新。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> that commits a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 認可交易的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: If this command is executed when there are not any open transactions, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在沒有任何開放異動時執行這個命令，就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Gets the command that the editor raises to indicate to the host that the updating of a property value is complete.
trans-unit.target: 取得編輯器所引發的命令，以便向主機指出屬性值的更新已完成。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> that indicates that the updating of a value is complete.
trans-unit.target: 指出值的更新已完成之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: This enables the host to do cleanup or potentially change the focus to a different <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓主機針對不同的 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 執行清除，或以潛在方式變更焦點。

trans-unit.source: Gets the command that the editor raises to switch the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> to <see cref="F:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode.Dialog" /> editing mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得編輯器所引發的命令，以便將 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> 切換至 <see cref="F:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode.Dialog" /> 編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> that switches the edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 切換編輯模式的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the command that the editor raises to switch the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> to <see cref="F:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode.ExtendedPinned" /> editing mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得編輯器所引發的命令，以便將 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> 切換至 <see cref="F:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode.ExtendedPinned" /> 編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> that switches the edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 切換編輯模式的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the command that the editor raises to switch the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> to <see cref="F:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode.ExtendedPopup" /> editing mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得編輯器所引發的命令，以便將 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> 切換至 <see cref="F:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode.ExtendedPopup" /> 編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> that switches the edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 切換編輯模式的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the command that the editor raises to switch the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> to <see cref="F:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode.Inline" /> editing mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得編輯器所引發的命令，以便將 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> 切換至 <see cref="F:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode.Inline" /> 編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> that switches the edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 切換編輯模式的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" />。
